reviews.review:
This is hands down the best teacher or professor I have ever had in my life. The class is very easy and Ari makes it so fun. Originally I was taking this to get the easy A, but this is my favorite class I have ever taken in college thanks to Ari. This man is such a nice guy, he genuinely cares about his students and it shows. 
Also if you are worried about the class being 2 hours and 15 minutes don't be, we usually end class after an hour of being there.
If you are thinking about taking this class or this professor please do it.

name: HESI424
title: Leadership and the Jewish Community
description: Offers students the opportunity to critically examine leadership and leadership identity development in relation to Jewish culture and identity. Explores how Jewish culture and ethnicity influence leadership styles and the role that leadership has played within Jewish history. Students will explore general leadership theories as well as personal leadership identity development in both an overall sense and as a member of the Jewish community. Examines leaders within the Jewish movement and how their leadership has influenced Jewish communities and explores issues facing the Jewish community both on college campuses and in the world and prepare student leaders to act as advocates for the Jewish community.
